title: Goran Soderstrom
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Göran Söderström**

Göran Söderström (born 1974) lives and works in Stockholm, [Sweden](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sweden). Founder of the type design studio [Autodidakt](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Autodidakt). Also working at [Pangea design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pangea%20design) with custom type.

**Commercial fonts:**  
The Satura Suite (2010), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/satura-suite).  
Meadow Condensed (2010), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/meadow).  
Heroine (2009), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/heroine).  
Meadow (2009), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/meadow).  
Flieger (2008), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/flieger).  
Shabash (2008), released by [PSY/OPS](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_shabash.html).  
Exemplar (2008), released by [PSY/OPS](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_exemplar.html).  
Navelfluff (2006), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000225).  
Trentor (2006), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000223).  
Trentor Script (2006), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000224).

**Custom type:**  
 [SEB Basic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/autodidakt.se/#120358/SEB-Basic) (2009), custom typeface for SEB Group.

[Enighet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/pangeadesign.se/case/lo-enighet) (2007), custom typeface for LO, The Swedish Trade Union Confederation. Enighet was awarded in European Design Awards 2008.

**Collaborations:**  
 [FF Dagny](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/fontshop.com/fontlist/families/ff_dagny_ot/) (2009), released by [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop).

[Pilo Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000356) (2008), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer). Collaboration with Kenneth Pilo and Mårten Fischer.

[Berling Nova Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.linotype.com/271380/berlingnovasans-family.html) (2007), Editing, adjustments and font development. Designed by [Fredrik Andersson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fredrik%20Andersson) and [Örjan Nordling](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Orjan%20Nordling) at [Pangea design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pangea%20design) .

[Pilo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000314) (2007), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer). Collaboration with Kenneth Pilo, Mårten Fischer and Ray Larabie.

**Free fonts:**  
Autostyler (2006).

**Website & Social media:**  
 [http://www.autodidakt.se](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.autodidakt.se/ "http://www.autodidakt.se")  
 [http://www.facebook.com/autodidakt](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/www.facebook.com/autodidakt "http://www.facebook.com/autodidakt")  
 [http://twitter.com/GoranSoderstrom](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164045/http:/twitter.com/GoranSoderstrom "http://twitter.com/GoranSoderstrom")
author: Goran Soderstrom
